# Perfectionist's Brew (Trait)
## Overview
**Perfectionist's Brew:** You know that potion recipes should be followed with exact precision. You gain a +2 trait bonus on all [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] (alchemy) checks and on [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] checks made to brew potions.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 58
